price: 1. Ketetapan Allah*(448) pasti datang, maka janganlah kamu meminta agar dipercepat (datang)nya. Mahasuci Allah dan Mahatinggi Dia dari apa yang mereka persekutukan.
arabic: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
footnotes: *448). Hari Kiamat yang telah diancamkan kepada orang musyrik.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: atā amru al-lahi falā tastaʿjilūhu sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
